sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-sparkline
        :value="value"
        :gradient="gradient"
        :smooth="radius || false"
        :padding="padding"
        :line-width="lineWidth"
        :stroke-linecap="lineCap"
        :gradient-direction="gradientDirection"
        :fill="fill"
        :type="type"
        :auto-line-width="autoLineWidth"
        auto-draw
        :show-labels="showLabels"
        :label-size="labelSize"
    ></v-sparkline>

    <v-divider class="pink--text"></v-divider>

  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
const gradients = [
  ['#222'],
  ['#42b3f4'],
  ['pink', 'deeppink', 'hotpink'], // Changed to pink theme colors
  ['purple', 'violet'],
  ['#00c6ff', '#F0F', '#FF0'],
  ['#f72047', '#ffd200', '#1feaea'],
]

export default {
  data: () => ({
    showLabels: true,
    lineWidth: 2,
    labelSize: 7,
    radius: 10,
    padding: 8,
    lineCap: 'round',
    gradient: gradients[2], // Changed to use pink gradient
    value: [0, 2, 5, 9, 5, 10, 3],
    gradientDirection: 'top',
    fill: false,
    type: 'trend',
    autoLineWidth: false,
  }),
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-divider {
  border-color: #ff4081; /* Pink theme color */
}
</style>
